---

<p align="center"> The unofficial scrap Hiru News
    <br> 
</p>
<p align="center"> This unofficial scratch code for Hiru News is by Omindu Anjana. The news given here belongs to this website https://www.hirunews.lk/. I am a 1st year university student studying BSc(Hons) Software Engineering Degree at Java Institute For Advanced Technology. <br> </p>


## üèÅ Getting Started <a name = "getting_started"></a>

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes.

### Installing


```sh
yarn add hirunews-scrap
```

or

```sh
npm i hirunews-scrap
```

## üéà Usage <a name="usage"></a>

```ts
const Hiru = require('hirunews-scrap');

const api = new Hiru()
```

## üéàReact-native Usage <a name="usage"></a>

```ts


import Hiru from 'hirunews-scrap';

const api = new Hiru();
```

## Get Latest Breaking News
```ts

const News = await api.BreakingNews();
console.log(News);
```

## Get Latest Main News
```ts
const News = await api.MainNews();
console.log(News);
```
```ts
{
  code: 200,
  code_creator: {
    name: 'Omindu_Anjana',
    github: '@OminduAnjana',
    group: 'Nex Group'
  },
  results: {
    title: '‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∂Ø‡∑ö‡∑Å ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂¥‡∂∫‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∂ú‡∑î‡∂´‡∂∫‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∂ö‡∑ä',
    news: '\n' +
      '‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂ú‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂ª ‡∑É‡∑Ñ ‡∂å‡∑Ä ‡∂¥‡∑Ö‡∑è‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂Ω ‡∂¥‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑Ö‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∂ú‡∑î‡∂´ ‡∂≠‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂∫‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø (26) ‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂± ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∑Ç‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± ‡∂∂‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∂ú‡∑î‡∂´ ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂∫‡∑è ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑î‡∑Ä ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑Ä‡∑ö‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂∏‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑Ä‡∑É‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è. \n' +
```

```ts
{
  code: 200,
  code_creator: {
    name: 'Omindu_Anjana',
    github: '@OminduAnjana',
    group: 'Nex Group'
  },
  results: {
    title: '‡∑Å‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑ì ‡∂Ω‡∂Ç‡∂ö‡∑è ‡∂â‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑Ç‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ä 2022 Star Awards ‡∂ã‡∑Ö‡∑ô‡∂Ω‡∑ö ‡∂Ø‡∑ì ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂∫ ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂´‡∑î‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂∫‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑í‡∑Ç‡∑ä‡∂ß ‡∂¢‡∂∫‡∂ú‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑Ñ‡∂´ ‡∂Ö‡∂ú‡∂∫‡∂∫‡∑í',
    news: '\n' +
```

## Get News

```ts
const Hiru = require('hirunews-scrap');
const api = new Hiru()

async function News() {
    try {
        const News = await api.MainNews();
        console.log(News);
       
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error getting Main news data:', error.message);
    }
}

News();
```
